rules.policy_rule: Confidentiality obligations must last for at least 3 years.
rules.explanation: No explicit confidentiality duration found; policy requires >=3 years.
rules.recommended_fix: Confidentiality obligations shall continue for a period of three (3) years after termination.

rules.policy_rule: Liability cap must not exceed 1.5x the total fees paid.
rules.explanation: No explicit liability cap found; policy recommends adding a numeric cap.
rules.recommended_fix: Liability shall be limited to 1.5x the total fees paid.

rules.policy_rule: Provider must not sell or commercialize Client Data without explicit consent.
rules.explanation: Text allows selling or commercial use of client data without consent.
rules.recommended_fix: Provider shall not sell, license, or commercialize Client Data without the Client's explicit consent.

rules.policy_rule: Termination must require at least 30 days notice or payment in lieu.
rules.explanation: Termination clause lacks a 30-day notice period.
rules.recommended_fix: Either Party may terminate this Agreement with at least thirty (30) days' written notice or payment in lieu.

rules.policy_rule: Provider must provide an uptime guarantee and not suspend services arbitrarily.
rules.explanation: No uptime or SLA found; service suspension risk present.
rules.recommended_fix: Provider shall target an uptime of at least 99.5% and provide remedies for extended outages.

rules.policy_rule: Provider must take reasonable responsibility for protecting Client Data stored on its servers.
rules.explanation: No explicit security obligations found; this is high risk.
rules.recommended_fix: Provider shall implement reasonable technical and organizational measures (including encryption and access control) to protect Client Data.

rules.policy_rule: Provider must provide refunds or remedies for extended outages or breaches.
rules.recommended_fix: Provider shall provide refunds or credits for extended outages or material breaches.

rules.policy_rule: Contract must be governed by a recognized legal jurisdiction and not by internal policies only.
rules.explanation: No recognized governing law detected or governance only by internal policies.
rules.recommended_fix: This Agreement shall be governed by the laws of a recognized jurisdiction (e.g., State of New York).

rules.policy_rule: Dispute resolution must allow independent arbitration or judicial review.
rules.explanation: Dispute resolution terms found; verify independence and fairness.
rules.recommended_fix: All disputes shall be resolved through independent arbitration or judicial review allowing parties fair process.
